function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases through IoT systems and infrastructure.","Impact":"Risk of widespread disease transmission and outbreak within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, regular disinfection of IoT devices, and monitoring of environmental conditions.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for environmental monitoring, disinfection robots, and remote monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities, IoT system operators."}]}
